title: How can i delete my chat history?
body: Hello,i really want to delete my chat conversations,how can i do it?

replies.body: If you're referring to chat messages from friends only, I don't believe they stick around for long.  Unfortunately, three's no way for either support or a player to manually remove chat messages or history.  Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you for the information.  I feel like deleting chat history (or clearing) should be a feature request.

if u unfriend someone than u add him again the chat will be recovered :p thats happened to me once . i deleted a friend than after weeks i added him again when i press the chat bottom . i found the old conversation back
Click the gear button on the chat you want to clear, and the big bold button says clear chat history.
